title: Mobile operators : carrier market shares in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2018
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
There is a difference of 27.0 between the maximum Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and minimum Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Mobile Carrier in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 28.0 is found at Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and the minimum is found at Talk Talk where Mobile Carrier is 1.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Mobile Carrier, and Market share in each Mobile Carrier on the y axis.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
There is a difference of 27.0 between the maximum Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) and minimum Mobile Carrier Talk Talk.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Mobile Carrier in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share and Talk Talk has the lowest Market share.
The lowest value at Mobile Carrier Talk Talk is 28.0x times less than the highest value at BT (including EE).
The Mobile Carrier BT (including EE) has the highest Market share, followed by O2, and Vodafone. Down to the Mobile Carrier Talk Talk which is the lowest.
Mobile Carrier Talk Talk, iD Mobile, and Sky share the same value 1.0.
Considered together, the average Market share in all 9 Mobile Carriers is roughly 11.11.
The Market share is 100.0 if we add up values of all Mobile Carriers.
